title: Asking for the setlist after a show
context: Ask a roadie or security guard if you can keep the paper song list.

content.bestLine: Can I keep the setlist, please?

neutral.text: Can I have a copy of the setlist?
Do you have an extra setlist?
Is there a setlist I can take?
Can you give me the setlist?
I'd love to have the setlist.
Do you mind if I take the setlist?

informal.text: Hey, can I grab the setlist?
Mind if I take a setlist?
Can I get a setlist from you?
Any chance I can get the setlist?
Can you hook me up with the setlist?

slang.text: Yo, can I cop the setlist?
Got a setlist to spare, dude?
Can I get that setlist, pls?

patterns.meaning: Asking for permission to take the setlist
Inquiring about the availability of a setlist

dialogs.description: Asking a roadie for the setlist

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hey, can I grab the setlist?

lines.speaker: Roadie
lines.text: Yeah, sure thing. Let me just finish packing up.

dialogs.description: Requesting the setlist from a security guard

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Excuse me, can I get a copy of the setlist?

lines.speaker: Security Guard
lines.text: I'm not sure, let me check with the stage manager.
